project.name: Caça Plantão Website
project.description: Landing page e aplicação web para a plataforma Caça Plantão

principles: Clear separation of concerns between UI, logic, and data

patterns.name: Page Component
patterns.description: Components that serve as Next.js pages

patterns.name: Layout Component
patterns.description: Components that define the layout for pages

patterns.name: Route Handlers
patterns.description: API endpoints using Next.js route handlers

guidelines: Use TypeScript types for all props and state
Keep components focused on a single responsibility
Prefer server components where possible for better performance
Use client components only when necessary for interactivity
Follow Prisma best practices for database queries
Keep styling within Tailwind CSS utility classes
Handle errors properly in all async operations
